Basketball was created in 1891. First, every shot was worth two points. Things are different now. Some shots are worth three points. These are called “threes”. Threes changed basketball.

There weren’t always threes. They started in 1945. It was a college game. Then they went to the NBA. This was in 1979. First people didn’t shoot many threes. Now they do.

Let’s see why. The 3-point percentage is 36%. The 2-point percentage is 46%. Imagine a player shoots 100 shots. Let’s say he shoots threes. He’ll make about 36. So, he’ll have 108 points. What if he shoots twos? He’ll make about 46. So, he’ll have 92 points. So, shooting threes is good.

This has changed basketball. There are more layups and threes. There are fewer big centers. Teams spread out their offenses. They put more people outside. They put less inside. 

Some people like threes. They think threes are exciting. Threes make comebacks easier. 

Other people don’t like threes. They think threes are boring. They think threes aren’t basketball. Greg Popovich doesn’t like threes. He is the Spurs’ coach. He said, “I still hate it. I’ll never like it. I don’t think it’s basketball.”

Threes are important. People will keep shooting threes. They might add 4-pointers. Steph Curry would like this. Would you?

In basketball, shots are worth different amounts of points. It depends where you shoot from. If you make a basket from inside the “3-point line,” it’s worth 2 points. If you make one from outside the 3-point line, it’s worth 3 points. But it wasn’t always this way. In the beginning, every basket was worth two points. Later, the 3-point line was added. This rule change has had a big impact on basketball. It will impact the future of basketball too.

First some history. The 3-point shot was first used in a college game in 1945. Then it was used in professional leagues. In 1979, it was used by the NBA. It has stuck ever since.

The use of threes has increased a lot. In 1979, teams shot just under 3 threes per game. Ten years later, they shot 6.5 per game. Today, they shoot 27 per game. 

Let’s see why. The 3-point percentage is 36%. The 2-point percentage is 46%. Imagine a player shoots 100 shots. Let’s say he shoots threes. Then he’ll make 36 on average. So, he’ll have 108 points. What happens if he shoots twos? Then, he’ll make 46 on average. So, he’ll have 92 points. So, it seems like a good idea to shoot threes.

The best teams realized this. Look at the 4 teams in the Conference Finals last year. The Warriors shot the least threes out of all four teams! They were 6th in the league in threes attempted. The other 3 teams were 1, 2, and 3. 

This has changed the game. People don’t shoot from medium distance anymore. There are more layups and threes. There are fewer big centers. There are more slim big men who can shoot threes. Teams spread out their offenses more. They put more people on the perimeter. They put less people close to the basket. 

People have different opinions about threes. Some people like threes. They think threes are exciting. Also, threes make comebacks easier. Some people like that.

Other people don’t like threes. Threes cause less teamwork. Threes also take away variety. Just threes and layups, with nothing in-between. Some people think threes aren’t basketball. Spurs coach Greg Popovich said, “I still hate it. I’ll never like it. I don’t think it’s basketball. I think it’s kind of like a circus sort of thing.”

Like it or not, it seems the 3 is here to stay. It’s more important today than ever before. That’s not likely to change. They might even add a 4-point line. I’m sure Steph Curry wouldn’t mind. Would you?

article_text:
In basketball, shots are worth different amounts of points depending on where you shoot them from. If you make a basket from inside the “3-point line,” it is worth 2 points. If you make one from outside the 3-point line, it’s worth 3 points. But it wasn’t always this way. In the early days, every basket was worth just two points. It wasn’t until recently that the 3-point line was added. This rule change has had a big impact on basketball. It will continue to shape its future going forward.

First a little history. The 3-point shot was first tested out in a college game in 1945. In the next few decades, it started being used in professional leagues. Eventually, in 1979, it was adopted by the NBA. It has stuck ever since.

The use of threes has increased a lot. In 1979, teams shot just under 3 threes per game. Ten years later, they shot 6.5 per game. Today, they shoot 27 per game. 

It’s not hard to understand why teams are shooting more threes. The league-wide 3-point percentage is 36%. The 2-point percentage is 46%. So, on average, players will make 36 out of every 100 threes they take. The will make 46 out of every 100 twos. In other words, they’ll get 108 points for every 100 shots if they shoot threes. They’ll only get 92 points if they shoot twos. So, it seems like a good idea to shoot threes.

The best teams realized this. Look at the 4 teams in the Conference Finals last year. The Warriors shot the least threes out of all four teams! They were 6th in the league in threes attempted. The other 3 teams were 1, 2, and 3. 

This increase in 3-point attempts has changed the game. The mid-range game (shots from about 15 feet away) has almost disappeared. Players are taking lots of layups and threes. There are fewer big centers. There are more slim big men who can shoot threes. Teams have started spreading out their offenses more. They put more people on the perimeter and less people close to the basket. 

Reactions to this change in the game are mixed. Some are in favor of the 3. They think it makes basketball more exciting. They also like that it makes last-second comebacks easier.

Others are against the 3-pointer. Some would even go so far as to say that it’s ruined basketball. These people think it’s led to less teamwork. Some people also think today’s game has less variety. Just threes and layups, with nothing in-between. And then some people think the 3-pointer just isn’t basketball. For example, in a 2015 interview Spurs coach Greg Popovich said, “I still hate it. I’ll never embrace it. I don’t think it’s basketball. I think it’s kind of like a circus sort of thing.”

Like it or not, it seems the 3 is here to stay. It’s more important today than ever before, and that’s not likely to change. In fact, there have even been some rumors of adding a 4-point line. I’m sure Steph Curry wouldn’t mind. Would you?

It’s not hard to understand why teams are shooting more threes. The league-wide 3-point percentage is 36%. The 2-point percentage is 46%. They’ll only get 92 points if they shoot twos. So, it seems like a good idea to shoot threes.

They ranked 6th in the league in 3’s attempted. The other 3 teams--The Rockets, Cavs, and Celtics--ranked 1, 2, and 3.

Players are taking almost exclusively layups and threes. Big centers are becoming less common. There are more slim big men who can shoot threes. Teams have started spreading out their offenses much more. They put more people on the perimeter and less people close to the basket.

Others are against the 3-pointer. Some would even go so far as to say that it’s ruined basketball. These people think it’s led to less teamwork. Some people also think today’s game has less variety. I’ll never embrace it. I don’t think it’s basketball. I think it’s kind of like a circus sort of thing.”

Like it or not, it seems the 3 is here to stay. It’s more important today than ever before, and that’s not likely to change. In fact, there have even been some rumors of adding a 4-point line. I’m sure Steph Curry wouldn’t mind. Would you?

article_text:
Barack Obama was the first African-American president. He wasn’t just a president. He changed America.

Obama was born in 1961. He was born in Hawaii. His father was Kenyan. His mother was European.

Obama’s parents separated when he was 3. Since then, he only saw his father once.

Obama began studying at St. Francis Pre-Education. He was 3. He stayed there until he was 5. Afterwards, he went to Indonesian-language schools in Jakarta. There he spent four years. He learned Indonesian.

He studied English with his mother. After four years in Jakarta, he returned to Honolulu. He finished high school in Honolulu. This was in 1979.

Obama went to Occidental College. In 1981, he made his first speech. South Africa had racist laws. He wanted Occidental to stop investing in South African businesses.

He switched to Columbia University. He majored in political science. He also studied international relations. He also studied English literature. He graduated in 1983.

Obama worked at the Business International Corporation for a year. Then he worked at the New York Public Interest Research Group. He worked there for three months.

Obama did a lot before attending Harvard. He wrote a successful book. He did community development projects. He travelled to Europe.

Then he went to Harvard. He was editor of the Harvard Law Review. Later, he became president of the Harvard Law Review. He was the first African-American to do this.

Obama graduated in 1991. He was well-known. He helped work for racial equality.

Five years later, Obama was elected to the Senate in Illinois. As senator, he helped improve welfare. He helped improve tax credits for the poor. He helped improve childcare.

Obama ran for president in 2008. He gave an announcement speech. He talked about ending the war in Iraq. He also talked about improving energy independence. He talked about changing healthcare.

Obama served two terms as president. He did a lot. He legalized same sex marriage. He reformed the healthcare system. He created 11 million jobs. He reduced the number of people in jail.

Barack Obama is not ordinary. He is a Nobel Laureate. He was the most admired man in America. He was ranked the 8’th greatest American president. He is a symbol of hope.

Gandhi used Satyagraha to gain many important rights for Indians in South Africa. They started calling him “Mahatma.” This means “Great Soul.”

Kheda was dealing with a flood and famine. He helped them get relief from taxes.

Gandhi thought of another strategy. It was called “non-cooperation.” He told people not to use British goods. He told people to quit government jobs. He told them to give up British titles. Sometimes they come from math. Mathematicians define these objects. They try to make them simple. This makes them easy to study.

 There are many areas of math. One area is “algebra.” Algebra is about “algebraic objects.” Numbers are algebraic objects. There are more. Some have weird names. Groups. Rings. Fields. Often, they come from real life. Then, we study them using math. Eventually, we learn new things.

Algebra has many parts. One is “linear algebra.” Linear algebra is about “vector spaces.” Vector spaces are like our world. Linear algebra is important. It is used in math. It is used in science.

Another area of math is “analysis.” Analysis is about functions. Functions “take in” a number and “spit out” another number. There are many functions. Analysis is big. It has many applications. MP3 and JPEG files use analysis.

There are more areas of math. There is topology. Topology is about topological spaces. These are like our world. There is combinatorics. This is advanced counting. There is also number theory. This is about numbers. The list goes on. It continues to expand. Hopefully you have a better idea of what math is. Remember it is a big subject. If you don’t like one part of math, you might like another.

article_text:
The concept of flight can never be thoroughly discussed without making reference to the Wright Brothers. Commonly addressed together, this group is made up of two brothers – Wilbur and Orville Wright.

 The two American inventors were born four years apart from each other to the Wright family in Ohio, and that was where the story all began.

 They were not the first to invent the aircraft, but they are credited with this feat since they were the pioneers of aviation technology. They developed controls that made flight of fixed-wings aircrafts possible.

 Growing up, their father brought home a model helicopter made from bamboo, paper, cork and rubber. They played with this toy helicopter until it broke. Then they made a replica for themselves. The brothers would later point back to this as being the defining moment in their journey.

 The two brothers attended high school, but neither was awarded a diploma. Wilbur finished four years of high school but missed out on his diploma since his family moved before he could get it. Orville, on the other hand, dropped out of school in favor of building a printing press business instead.

 This business was successful to some point, and Wilbur joined in on the print shop. Their printing press lasted for a while before it failed. Afterwards, it was converted to a commercial printing press.

 When the national bicycle craze era kicked in, the brothers sought to cash in and created a company of their own to handle sales and repairs of bicycle. The proceeds from this shop were spent on their hidden interest in flight.

 At the time when the Wright brothers will come out with their first model, there were already a series of inventors who had working prototypes. However, they excelled in the kind of approach they took to the entire flight technology – focusing more on controls than the other inventors.

 While others thought the pilot’s body would be the best means to control the craft in flight, the Wright brothers worked toward making sure mechanical controls were at the service of the pilot instead.

 This set them apart from all the others inventors.

 The Wright brothers built their first ‘heavier than air’ aircraft and proceeded to fly it. This was after a lot of tests had been done with gliders of different shapes, configurations, and sizes.

 They had also spoken with different engine manufacturing companies. None of them could meet their requirements for an engine that was powerful yet light enough. In the end, they had to turn to their in-house bicycle repair specialist who made them an engine from aluminum (not a common practice at the time) in under six weeks.

 At the time of first flight, the Wilbur brothers recorded a success. Their aircraft attained up to 852 feet and spent a combined 52 seconds in the air. As laudable as that feat was, no one believed the brothers.

 To make sure the whole world saw them for the geniuses they were, they left for Europe. Settling in France, the Wright brothers organized a series of test flights. They even gave rides to journalists and important personalities. It didn’t take long for their fame to spread far and wide, and they started making the aircrafts for sale.

 They sold so many aircrafts, they became very wealthy businessmen in France. By the time they returned home, they had already secured a place in the hearts of everyone wanting aircrafts. They also had contracts from European and American companies to fill.

Until the time of their death, the brothers notably took joint credit for their work. This is believed to be one of the many reasons for their success.

They each used the strength of one another in making the joint venture work. While Will was the business mind of the operation, Orville was a brilliant mind in contributing ideas to the overall success of the entire thing too.

Before their death, both brothers never married, and it was unclear if they had any kids. Wilbur was the first to die after falling ill and being diagnosed of typhoid. He died at their family home at the age of 45.

Orville, on the other hand, lived to see over 35 years more than his brother. In that time, he transformed from an inventor to an elder statesman of aviation. He lived to see many more developments of his joint invention before falling to a heart attack.

Without their work, it would be difficult to think of where aviation technology would be today. Their willingness to think outside the box led to the development of aviation controls as we know them today.

With the building of every new aircraft, the Wright brothers will always be remembered. They were the very first ones to lay the template for aviation controls as we know them today.
